title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1900.1 - Purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1900.1 - Purposes

State Regulations

The regulations in this Part implement the provisions
of article XVIII of the Private Housing Finance Law (the act). The act
establishes a program to provide funds for eligible applicants to rehabilitate
vacant and underutilized residential properties, to convert nonresidential
properties to residential properties and to construct new housing to promote
the preservation and creation of affordable housing for persons of low
income. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1900.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
